If you are reading this right now, and enjoy puzzles, humor, or a well designed game: stop reading this, and buy Portal 2. Now, you have not heeded my advice, so obviously you are not convinced. Portal 2 is one of the best games I have ever played. The story is very well done, but what really stands out is the dialogue. Most of the story is told by one of two robots saying hilarious things at you. The humor is very dark, and more than a little macabre. The gameplay also stands out, you must solve three dimensional puzzles using a device that allows you to move through a hole in space time and come out somewhere else. There are also a menagerie of other objects that can be introduced into a puzzle to change its landscape. My description of the game does not do it justice. In short, buy portal 2... now, go do it... seriously.

10 out of 10, if you excuse me, I'm going to go play portal 2 now.
내 인생 최고의 게임!

portal 1 felt like more of an experiment. but portal 2 is amazing in every way. the story is great, more than triple of portal 1 levels and ofcourse new features. i just love this game and you should also be playing this and loving it. 100 % recommended.
Great game and sequel to Portal. Definitely a Buy!

Here's a few questions:
Do you like robots?

HECK YEAH YOU LIKE ROBOTS. Who the heck doesn't like robots? I mean, come on. Robots are awesome.

Do you like science?
HECK YEAH YOU LIKE SCIENCE. Science is fun! And it lets you learn all kinds of new stuff! You want to learn cool stuff about physics and robotics, don't ya? 

Do you like clever dialogue, complex storylines, and addicting gameplay?
How about tons of interesting, well rounded, complex and morally grey characters?
HECK YEAH YOU DO! Well, this game's got it all. 

I've gotta say, this is possibly THE BEST game ever made. After at least ten full playthroughs across multiple gaming platforms, Portal has never gotten old.
And with the Steam copy, you get EVEN MORE!
The fun doesn't stop after you complete the single player and co-op campaigns.
There's tons of great community based add ons, such as Portal Stories: Mel, Aperture Tag, Thinking with Time-Machine, and the near-endless list of Perpetual Testing Initiative maps.

So, one final question:

Do you want to be a part of this awesomeness?
HECK YEAH YOU DO.

You don't even need to like puzzle games, you can buy this just to hear GLaDOS talking.
She will make your day.
P.S. You need to pass the puzzles to hear her speeches, so my first sentence might be wrong, you should love puzzle games.
Rien à dire, on accroche tout de suite ... jusqu'à le terminer très rapidement ! Mais pas de soucis la communauté fournit beaucoup de niveau supplémentaire.

Como podemos começar a falar de uma das obras primas do mundos dos video games? Gráficos muito bons,História excelente,personagens fodas,Glados é a melhor vilã do mundo dos vídeo games e a I.A. mais carismática da ficção(espero que o Hal não tenha visto essa análise), Wheatley também é sensacional,os robôs do modo coop,além disso seu multiplayer é viciante e inovador (mesmo pra 2015/2016) e sua jogabillidade aprimorada em relação ao antecessor


Enfin, um dos 10 melhores jogos que já joguei e no meu top 5 da geração passada

Nota geral: 10

prós:
-História e final surpreendente
-Gameplay viciante
-Multiplayer viciante
-personagens carismáticos
-ambientação muito maior que a do primeiro jogo

contras:
-pode não agradar a algumas pessoas
Найс! Крутая игруха и графика тоже неплохая) И даже по сетке гамать можно) Прикольная головоломка для себя и друзей!
Отличная игра
花了几个小时把单人通了一遍，并没有太大的难度，但是很有意思，一个人类和两个ai之间的互动真的让人沉浸其中，这是个用了心创作出来的故事。

O que dizer de um game tão bom como esse.
Um jogo relativamente "antigo", mas que ainda impressiona muita gente e que impressiona ate as gerações mais novas.

Bom, se eu recomendo o jogo? Claro, acho que se você tiver interesse em algo diferente é uma boa escolha.

A jogabilidade é unica. Os gráficos são surpreendentes até hoje. A história engraçada, chamativa, sempre faz você querer jogar mais, na verdade sempre te chama para jogar mais.
Acho que o forte de Portal 2 não é a jogabilidade ou a história e sim os cenários, os sons (efeitos sonoros e etc). A valve, e os criadores, tiveram um carinho de prestar atenção em cada detalhe, preencher os limites dos mapas com lacunas parecendo que a Aperture não é somente mapas individuais e sim um complexo gigantesco de testes e etc.
E quando você termina o game, não para por ai, workshop está cheio de mapas e novas jogabilidades... O game não se limita somente na história e nem ao singleplayer, multiplayer e coop.

Bom, posso ficar aqui falando sobre Portal 2 a vida toda e sempre vai ter algo novo para falar... Recomendo.

The humor is great, the puzzles are stellar, the voice acting is amazing.. Like... I want to live inside this game and just run around with a portal gun doing puzzles forever. I'd totally be down. With the amount of content you get with this game, its a no brainer.
It's only 2 euro for this masterpiece.

This is indeed the very game that all steam owners should buy and play, then orship Gabe for this mighty creation, whilst it is a 'simple' concept, almost gimmicky, the gameplay is fluid, the sounds effective; by god nothing is more fun then an endles portal loop.

Whilst it contains no features from the 'Tri-force of evil' (COC, COD, CC) it shows that games don't have to be PTW, brown shooters or repetitive to be worth playing for a long time.

Definitely worth a buy if you have any money, instead of buying food, buy and play this game!

Весьма недурственный пазл, который воспринимается как нечто большее.

Середина одиночной кампании впрочем понравилась меньше. Большие разрушеные пространства, где частенько непонятно не только что делать, но и куда вообще идти. Все таки пазл в котором не ясна цель - это очень специфическое развлечение.

Впечатляет как много атмосферы можно создать рассказчиком. Хотя можно было сделать и больше в этом направлении. А в середине игры опять таки игрок часто остается в полной тишине.
